titles.title: The life of Jesus Christ in you will rise again

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The life of Jesus Christ in you will rise again
The life of Jesus Christ in me will rise again
Though the floods may seem to drown it
or the fires of hell surround it
though that life seems buried in a tomb
it won't stay down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It will rise again, it will rise again
Surely as the sun it will rise
It will rise again, it will rise again
Higher than the stars in the sky
It can't stay down
